data.title: good food in Bartlett
data.text: Brad's has the typical BarBQ fare, not being originally from Memphis, I don't have the differentiating taste buds true Memphians are born with- I dont think I have ever had BAD barbecue.  Open for lunch and dinner and on the railroad tracks.

data.title: Homey BBQ place
data.text: We go to Brad's a lot.  It's always easy to get in and we really like the BBQ.  The Potato Salad is outstanding.  We get quarts of it when we have guests at our house for casual dining.  BBQ is a selective taste and some don't like Brads and some do.  We do!!  Drive up window is great for take home.  Been in Bartlett for years.  Nice, friendly, efficient atmosphere.

data.title: Very competitive menu located in the BBQ capitol of the world!
data.text: Like your BBQ hot or mild? Want ribs, chicken, pork, beef and homemade sides that remind you of mom's home cooking, plus? A quaint atmosphere that offers American nostalgia for you to view.

data.title: Consistent Food and Service
data.text: I have been eating at Brad's for 15 or so years. I have had most everything on the menu. It is exactly the same today as it was 15+ years ago. I have had better BBQ, but their food and service are consistent. I highly recommend their sides, especially the beans, potato salad and slaw.

data.title: Just oh so good!
data.text: My husband and I took the kids one day for lunch and we can't wait to go again. Everything was just delicious. We all cleaned our plates. And the sweet tea was just perfect! Prices are very reasonable. Go! You have to! Trust me, just do it!

data.title: Really pretty good, especially for take away.
data.text: This is a great place to call ahead and get some bbq. Ribs were just right. I've had the burgers here also and thought they were excellent. Great small town atmosphere. always coming back for more.

data.title: Decent
data.text: The bar-b-que was good; however, my grandmother and I both felt sick after eating the potato salad. The service and atmosphere were okay. There are certainly better bar-b-que places in the Memphis area.

data.title: Consistently Good
data.text: I am little confused why this place is listed under Memphis when it is in Bartlett. I have not eaten here in about 6-7 years and the food is still as good as it was then. Service is quick, the pulled pork & spaghetti is first-rate, and I like the relaxed atmosphere. I always recommend this to those who don't know about it. This is usually my first meal when visiting home.

data.title: Good "que"
data.text: Brad's does not have the high awareness level of several of the other bbq places in and around the Memphis area but they should.  In business for over 35 years and with three locations (Bartlett (burb) of Memphis, Moscow and Oakland (distance burb of Memphis) they do bbq right.  They offer the standard fare of pulled (or chopped) bbq with two sauces at the table.. standard sweet and the other hot..  Several of my favorite non bbq items is the 1/2 smoked chicken and the spaghetti.  The only thing I have to say bad about the "ghetti" is that some places offer bbq spaghetti where they serve it with a traditional meat sauce.  Don't take me wrong it is still good but I would love to see some "que" in there as well.  If you are not in the mood for bbq or chicken they do offer some burgers and grilled chicken but the Smoked Turkey or Smoked Ham on a croissant is wonderful also.  Make sure to finish it off with a Southern tradition and that would be Homemade Banana Pudding.  The only negative thing I can really say and this is purely a personal preference is they serve Pepsi.... come on guys.. Coke and bbq are what go together but I will let that pass.

data.title: My Favorite BBQ Place, Hands Down!
data.text: My co workers and I used to eat at Brad's at least once a week for about 5 years. The servers knew what we wanted to eat and drink. It's a really great place.The spaghetti is delish and the turkey sandwich is wonderful. Of course the BBQ is great, that goes without saying. But the staff is what makes it special. I miss Brad's very much, but whenever I'm in Bartlett I WILL be eating there again!

data.title: Love this Place- so consistent- Great Service
data.text: I love BBQ-- eat BBq 2-3 times a week. Brad's is the most consistent place ever! You know exactly what you are getting, always perfect. Service is very fast- very polite- straight to the point- Love the beans and their homemade sauce-- Great Place to eat BBQ!!!!!

data.title: Don't be put off by the exterior
data.text: Great food!  Good service! Very good value! In the heart of Bartlett it is easy to find and the sauces are the best.  Family friendly. If you like pulled pork then do not miss this little gem.

data.title: Great business lunch at Brad's!
data.text: San Antonio, Houston and Memphis in three days, whew! Brad's was a welcome site for our casual business lunch. The bar-b-q is excellent, the sides are very good and the service is the best.

data.title: The service has improved even more
data.text: I have been eating at Brad's for years and I love the plantation salad. And it is so easy to place an order at the window because you speak with a person and not a speaker like at a fast food place. The staff came to the window very quickly and took my order. They were very friendly and brought out the correct food in a few minutes. The whole process of ordering, receiving and paying for the order was all very quick and easy. It seems that the service has improved even more, although I have always received great service every time that I have been to Brad's. The plantation salad that I ordered had a lot of meat on it and the lettuce and tomatoes were fresh. I highly recommend this BBQ restaurant.

data.title: Good Barbque
data.text: Great barbque and reasonably priced. Best in Bartlett. Friendly staff and fast service. Great takeout.

data.title: Good BBQ
data.text:
Great BBQ, great ribs. Very good meal for the 
price. I will go out of my way to eat here. I like 
the choices of sides and the banana pudding tops
everything off perfect. That is my sons favorite.

data.title: Excellent ribs!
data.text: If you're in the area, make it a point to check this place out. I had a great half rack of ribs, great dry rub with just a bit of sauce cooked on to muddy it. Great service at the drive up too. Next time I'm in town, I'll go back and eat in the restaurant itself. Looks nice.

data.title: Great food and fast service
data.text: The food was very delicious and the staff are friendly and attentive. I have been ordering the plantation salad for years at Brad's and have always been very pleased with the salad. The salad has always been fresh and loaded with a lot of meat. The atmosphere is small and cozy and friendly and decorated with antiques on the ceiling and walls. Also at Brad's I like that I can just drive up to a window to place my order and speak with a real person and not a speaker like at a fast food place. I have been a customer of Brad's Bar-b-q for many years and I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who has never tried it before.

data.title: Great lunch!
data.text: Can't beat their lunch. We can eat here for what it cost at a fast food place & it's got a great burger!

data.title: One of the best
data.text:
Very friendly place.  Took grand kids and all had great food. Got 1 lb of pork and divided.  Wife and I had pork sandwiches.  Fries are large and tasty.  BBQ very good.  Lots of regular customers and that is good. Sides of slaw, baked beans, and potato salad were great.

Service was excellent and prices very reasonable.
